summary: A kindly but thieving shopaholic tries to turn her mistakes around, but does so by becoming a skilled computer hacker, something that could only get her into more trouble despite her goal to impress her beloved family.
cast: Marianne Sägebrecht|Brad Davis|Judge Reinhold|Erika Blumberger|Willy Harlander|John Hawkes|Patricia Zehentmayr|Courtney Kraus|Alex Winter|Lisa Fitzhugh|Lori Fitzhugh|David Denney|Dina Chandel|Ed Geldart|John William Galt|Bill Butler|Bonnie Pemberton|Helen Boyd|Betty King|Jane Hutchinson|Sara Van Horn|Phyllis Kirklin|Todd Tongen|María Roth
title: Rosalie va de compras
